description: This refreshing prawn laksa is just as good as takeaway and can be on the table even quicker.
name: Spicy Prawn Laksa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the prawns, sliced chilli, coriander stalks and rice noodles and simmer for 3 minutes. Serve with lime wedges and fresh coriander on top.
